Articles.Content: Thank you SQUAD!
thankyou squad downloading both versions now!

Not working. I get the following error when downloading from the main site:

Uh... trying to download from the KSP website.

Parse error: syntax error, unexpected end of file in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/multiplayDwn.php on line 132
why is this not on first page / news ?

>> Gimballing Engines now respond to roll input. The 4x engine cluster and RAPIER engine have gimbal roll authority even if stacked over the centerline (due to multiple nozzles).

VERY NICE!

And... Thank you, Squad!

Darn. Was up to 89%; thought I'd beat the crowds. Now I'm stuck at getting the login token...

We shall wait.

Times like this I love fibre-optic broadband :3. ALL DONE!

I get this as well. I think it's servese for AWRRRRRRHNGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG.

It's being worked on, top priority!

<3

Thank you <3
Lol the hype train plowed down the poor KSP dev team's servers....

Will the auto-patcher update the 32-bit version to 64-bit if your system is compatible, or do we need to manually download and move over to the 64-bit version?

Will the auto-patcher update the 32-bit version to 64-bit if your system is compatible, or do we need to manually download and move over to the 64-bit version?

Thats why I am trying to download a fresh 64 bit copy, just to make sure

That was the greatest hypetrain ride ever.

Now we need screenshots of the first player to officially complete a contact. Milestones! Celebrate some milestones!
Does anybody know how to apply the ARM patch to this? Does it come with ARM, or do we install 23.5 ARM over it?

"[CENSORED]!"

F5.

Does anybody know how to apply the ARM patch to this? Does it come with ARM, or do we install 23.5 ARM over it?

Just check the gamedata folder after it installs and see. If the NASA stuff is in there you know you have the ARM stuff. I would be very surprised if the .24 install doesn't include the stuff from all prior versions...
I would like to know this to

It comes with ARM.
